00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <fstream>
00020 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00021 #include "grotopologyreader.h"
00022 
00023 
00024 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00025 
00026 bool GROTopologyReader::ReadTopology(string file, Topology &top)
00027 { 
00028     // cleanup topology to store new data
00029     ifstream fl;
00030     string tmp;
00031     top.Cleanup();
00032     
00033     fl.open(file.c_str());
00034     if(!fl.is_open())
00035         return false;
00036 
00037     string title;
00038     getline(fl, title);
00039     
00040     getline(fl, tmp);
00041     int natoms = atoi(tmp.c_str());
00042     for(;natoms>0; natoms--) {
00043         char c[6];
00044         fl.read(c, 5);
00045         c[5] = 0;  
00046     
00047         string resname;
00048         fl >> resname;
00049         int resnr = atoi(c);
00050         if(resnr > top.ResidueCount()) {
00051             top.CreateResidue(resname);
00052 //            cout << " created residue " << resnr << resname<<"-\n";
00053         }
00054         string atomname;
00055         string x, y, z;
00056         fl >> atomname;
00057         fl >> tmp;
00058         fl >> x; fl >> y; fl >> z;
00059         top.CreateBead(1, atomname, top.GetOrCreateBeadType("no"), resnr, 1., 0.);
00060         getline(fl, tmp);
00061     }
00062     fl.close();
00063     
00064     cout << "WARNING: topology created from .gro file, masses and charges are wrong!\n";
00065     
00066     return true;
00067 }
00068
